= Description =

The _get_post_ filter returns an associative array for the entire post when given the post ID.

= Usage =

Generic invocation of any Output Filter occurs via the [TemplateFunctions#get_custom_field get_custom_field()] function:

_mixed_ *get_custom_field*( string _$input_ `[`, mixed _$options_ `]` ) 

 * *$input*: _string_.  
 * *$options*: _none_.
 * *OUTPUT*: _array_.  An associative array representing the post and all of its custom fields.

== Example 1==

{{{
<?php 

$post = get_custom_field('my_relation:get_post'); 
print $post['post_title'];
print $post['my_custom_field'];
?>
}}}
